scripts.test: mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:iced-coffee-script/register --require iced-coffee-coverage/register-istanbul test && istanbul report
scripts.test-fast: mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:iced-coffee-script/register --require iced-coffee-coverage/register-istanbul test -- --skip_solc && istanbul report
scripts.test-compiler: mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:iced-coffee-script/register --require iced-coffee-coverage/register-istanbul test -- --docker && istanbul report
scripts.test-compiler-fast: mocha --recursive --compilers coffee:iced-coffee-script/register --require iced-coffee-coverage/register-istanbul test -- --skip_solc --docker && istanbul report
